tweet: Thank you @POTUS for the invitation to today’s China trade agreement signing at the White House. This agreement with China is a positive first step toward addressing one of our biggest trade challenges. My statement here: http://bit.ly/2RjX3uT
Great meeting with @NebraskaWheat today where, we discussed the importance of #USMCA and the upcoming U.S.-China trade deal to Nebraska ag. pic.twitter.com/zXl3uZ1WtW

This January marks the 75th anniversary of the Auschwitz liberation during the closing months of World War II in Europe. Now we must do our part in fighting anti-Semitism wherever it may be. My column here: http://bit.ly/2TnsCXh

Yesterday, I recognized Allen Beermann, who is retiring from his long-time position as the executive director of the Nebraska Press Association. Watch my remarks here: http://bit.ly/308bEO1

Unidentified drones can present many problems, and the inability to determine their source is unacceptable. I have been in contact with the FAA and other agencies. We deserve answers. My statement: http://bit.ly/2N5tQCz
